name: The Honey Plot
summary: The bear has stolen a beehive and is trying to escape the country. Meanwhile the angry beekeepers are in hot pursuit and the bear must think fast in order to make his getaway.
info:
• 中文名: 蜂蜜密谋
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2012年
  • 片长: 3 分钟
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 类型: 动画 / 短片
  • 制片国家/地区: 英国
  • 导演: Al cox
